data.text: The rat king squats grotesquely atop a crudely carven stone block near the rear of the cave, hissing and chittering as you return. "Well?" it asks. "Has the human reconsidered?"

choice.text: Agree to help the rat king?

text: You agree to help the rat king with as much grace as you can muster in the current situation.
It chitters in appreciation. "Remember," it says. "Get rid of the cat. Reward is magic tool and spell book."
After a pause, it then remembers one more thing you can help with: "Rogue royals, in the human tunnels under the sky-lawn," it explains. "Kill them for additional shinies."
You explain that you can't commit to this right now, as your own tasks are very pressing.
The rat king hisses and chitters with annoyance, but does not attack. If you change your mind later - which you should, it hints - return and tell it at once.
You say nothing, simply readying your weapon as you prepare for battle.
